home.welcome: Hello, I am Fabian and I develop fab webs.

about.firstParagraph: Hello! I'm Fabian Lopez, a Full Stack Developer who loves creating efficient and fabulous websites. I'm always exploring new technologies to deliver the best solutions.
about.secondParagraph: My diverse journey includes running a transportation company and earning a Business Administration degree in a different country. Coupled with my passion for software development, I bring a unique understanding of both the technical and business aspects of every project.
about.thirdParagraph: I'm committed to helping you achieve your goals.

wannago.name: WannaGo
wannago.description: Take control of your plans with WannaGo! Craft exciting plans, invite your friends and family, and stay updated in real time. Who's seen the plan? Who's in? Who's out? With WannaGo, you're always in the loop. Don't just make plans—bring them to life with WannaGo. Let's get planning, let's get going, let's get engaged!
wannago.responsibilities: UX/UI design. Entire development of the web app.

huddler.name: Huddler
huddler.description: Meet, connect, and create with Huddler—the web designed to bring people together based on shared interests. With Huddler, you'll never have to do things alone again. Discover new activities, join existing events, or bring your own ideas to life by creating your own. Whether it's fishing, baking cookies, or playing the banjo, there's room for every passion in Huddler. Huddle with like-minded individuals and embrace the joy of shared experiences. Find your tribe with Huddler.
huddler.responsibilities: Aid in the desing of the site. Devised the 'recommended' algorithm. Implemented authorization & user settings

roadTrip.name: Road Trip - Campgrounds
roadTrip.description: Embark on your next adventure with Road Trips - Campgrounds, the essential web for road trip enthusiasts. Discover new campsites, share your experiences with ratings, and contribute to the vibrant community by adding new locations. Whether you're a seasoned road tripper or just starting out, Road Trips - Campgrounds is your guide to the great outdoors. Set out on the open road and let the journey begin with Road Trips - Campgrounds.
roadTrip.responsibilities: Refactor codebase from JavaScript to Typescript

portfolio.name: Fabian's Portfolio
portfolio.responsibilities: UX/UI design. Entire development of the web app.
